Text.Page:
Faeries hold secret power here in the forest. Few know what it is. Power that grows with time and need. Power deeply secluded where one could normally never reach.

That power should fall to me. Whatever it takes, no matter how long!
Hope will one day return and sprout from the ground in these lands. It's only a matter of time.
My seeds, my power, this forest will be my legacy. Your hope. My glory!
